scripts.build: npm run build-schema && npm run build-fake_bridge && npm run build-web
scripts.dev-web-emu: npm run build-schema && concurrently "npm run dev-fake_bridge" "npm run dev-web"
scripts.ros-push-prod: cd ros && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.prod.yaml build && docker push shiukaheng/stagehands:prod
scripts.ros-push-dev: cd ros && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.dev.yaml build && docker push shiukaheng/stagehands:dev
scripts.ros-pull-prod: cd ros && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.prod.yaml pull
scripts.ros-pull-dev: cd ros && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.dev.yaml pull
